string.name: crowdin_second_string_to_test
string.comment: Changing the order of the strings didn't cause a need for a new translation. Let's add this comment; if it's not removed it means the comment didn't cause a requirement for a new translation!

resources.string: This will be used to check that changing the order of strings does not require translation.

In order to ensure this string is not shown as untranslated, translate it the way you want. Probably using a single letter, so that it\'s quick. This string will never appear in ankidroid and is present here only to test crowdin feature.
